title: For sale: M101-3 Bresnahan PSA4  SOLD
author: timn1

posts.post_title: For sale: M101-3 Bresnahan PSA4  SOLD
posts.post_content:
One of the nicer vintage postcards you're likely to see.  Only 2 graded higher.

Comparables. 
Very few of these have sold according to VCP: 
-a PSA4 went for $670 in 2019
-an SGC 5 for $1170 in 2020.


Asking $SOLD shipped (PP/FF Preferred).  Email me at [url]apspr@att.net[/url]
